CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_animation_none=none CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_animation_slide=slide CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_animation_fade=fade CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_backgroundColor=Background color CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_foregroundColor=Foreground color CookieConsent.ConfigurationClass_opacity=Opacity ## Disclaimer ## cookieConsent.configure.title.mandatory=Necessary cookieConsent.configure.title.preferences=Preferences cookieConsent.configure.title.statistics=Statistics cookieConsent.configure.title.marketing=Marketing cookieConsent.crtUser.hasAccepted=Current user accepted cookies
## Administration ##
cookieConsent.administration.applications=GDPR Cookie Consent cookieConsent.administration.heading=GDPR Cookie Consent cookieConsent.administration.description.intro=This extension allows to setup a GDPR compatible consent screen for cookies and trackers. This will allow you to ask for your user's consent to activate or not the usage of cookies or trackers depending on different types of tools: cookieConsent.administration.description.necessary=necessary: necessary cookies which are mandatory and cannot be disabled cookieConsent.administration.description.preferences=preferences: preferences cookies or trackers which are optional and enabled by default but used only to remember your preferences cookieConsent.administration.description.statistics=statistics: statistics related cookies or trackers which are optional and enabled by default and user to record anonymous statistics cookieConsent.administration.description.marketing=marketing: marketing or other related cookies or trackers which are optional and disabled by default and can record personal information cookieConsent.administration.heading.general=General cookieConsent.administration.heading.configurableText=Configurable Text cookieConsent.administration.heading.trackers=Trackers and scripts cookieConsent.administration.heading.labels=Customize labels cookieConsent.administration.trigger.heading=Trigger pop-up manually cookieConsent.administration.trigger.content=For creating a link/button to open the cookie pop-up manually all it takes is to add the id **ResetCookies** to the clickable element, for example: cookieConsent.administration.trigger.example=Example cookieConsent.administration.trigger.linklabel=Reset cookie options cookieConsent.administration.info.param=The parameter should be **preferences**, **statistics** or **marketing**. cookieConsent.administration.info.notaccepted=The current user has not yet accepted the cookie policy
